mapper.select: SELECT tt.task_id, tt.task_name, tp.name AS prj_name, tp.pm_id, (SELECT name FROM TBL_EMP WHERE emp_id = tp.pm_id) AS pm_name, tts.t_status, tt.start_at, tt.end_at, tt.progress FROM TBL_TASK tt, TBL_PROJECT tp, TBL_T_STATUS tts WHERE tt.prj_id = tp.prj_id AND tt.t_status_id = tts.t_status_id AND tt.is_approval = 0 AND tt.approver_id = #{empId}

SELECT tt.task_id, tt.task_name, tp.name AS prj_name, tp.pm_id, (SELECT name FROM TBL_EMP WHERE emp_id = tp.pm_id) AS pm_name, tt.start_at, tt.end_at, tt.progress, tt.content FROM TBL_TASK tt, TBL_PROJECT tp WHERE tt.prj_id = tp.prj_id AND tt.task_id = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_APPROVAL(approval_id, ap_status_id, task_id, req_content, approver, create_at, update_at) VALUES (approval_seq.nextVal, 1, #{taskId}, #{reqContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmId}, sysdate, sysdate)
